name: Analyze Bifurcation Diagram
description: Performs bifurcation analysis on a dynamical system and generates a bifurcation diagram
author: Biomni Synthetic Biology Tools

inputs.name: time_series_data
inputs.description: A 2D array where each row represents a time series for a specific parameter value. Shape should be (n_parameter_values, n_time_points)

inputs.name: parameter_values
inputs.description: 1D array of parameter values corresponding to each time series. Shape should be (n_parameter_values,)

inputs.name: system_name
inputs.description: Name of the dynamical system being analyzed, used for plot titles

inputs.name: output_dir
inputs.description: Directory to save the output files

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: Research log summarizing the bifurcation analysis process and results
